description:
Covering the economics course with us, we will bring you through all each of the areas of economics required for the CFA Level 1 exam. The course covers Micro and Macroeconomics, and Global Economics.

How do you learn?

The 24 video lectures cover all the material of the economics syllabus and are delivered on a topic by topic basis. There are over 80 MCQs testing your knowledge at you work through all the material.

Who is this course for?

Anyone who is studying for the CFA Level 1 exams, or if you are interested in having a good understanding of economics.

What is covered?

The course covers a vast range of topics including;

  • Supply and Demand
  • Government Intervention
  • Market Structure
  • GDP
  • Inflation
  • Foreign Exchange
  • and many more
title: Economics - CFA Level 1 - 2014
